thread.section_title: Ski Service Verbier Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Ski Service Verbier | skiservice.com
thread.title: Nicholas
thread.title_full: Ski Service Verbier bewertet von Nicholas

author: Nicholas
title: Nicholas
text:
Have rented skis from Ski Service Verbier twice and I would highly recommend them for snowboard or ski rental. The people working there were the same even when visiting with a 3 year gap and were highly knowledgeable and personable during the fitting process. I showed up right before closing time and they were kind enough to stay a little late so that I could have my skis that night.
To be honest, I did not price compare, but I found their prices to be reasonable and expected for a 3-4 day rental.
